name: Time Wind
description:
Time Wind is a small platformer where time keeps resetting! Getting to the level exit in time may be difficult, but using the ghost of your previous attempt to assist you may just be the key.

Built in 24 hours for a self-imposed mini game jam with the randomly chosen theme "Stuck in a Loop". There are currently only two little levels, acting primarily as a proof of concept of a) a time looping platformer and b) using your ghost to overcome obstacles.
